description: The Operations Support Group provide a service to the London Fire Brigade. At the Operations Support Centre, we track, trace, repair and maintain firefighting PPE and equipment in our many workshops. The OSC also houses a large warehouse and stores and delivers everyday items and specialist equipment for Fire Stations across London.

factsheet.heading: Technical Workshops & Warehousing at the OSC
paragraphs: The Operations Support Centre houses multiskilled workshops for firefighting PPE and equipment to support fire stations across Greater London. Skilled and qualified technicians undertake safety critical work to ensure that firefighters get the best possible equipment to use. Additionally, the OSC provides a warehousing solution and delivery service to the LFB.

name: The Operations Support Centre - London Fire Brigade
